content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ i m still fully immersed in my granny stitch era and thrilled to share my latest creation with you a brand-new size-inclusive summer crochet granny top this garment has a top-down construction with an evenly increased yoke after we make the yoke we will split for the sleeves and body customizations for fit and sleeve length can be made in these sections lastly granny squares are created and then seamed along the bottom of the top if desired this top is easily modified to create a pretty dress with short sleeves this top pattern comes with a video tutorial 1 crochet hook g 4 0mm - or size to meet gauge 2 notions removable stitch marker 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 blocking board 6 yarn comfy fingering 7 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 218yds/50g in colorways white marlin flamingo sea foam or hobbii twister solid 8 55% cotton 45% acrylic 437yds/100g in colorways light rose dusty rose cream glacier yarn substitutions wecrochet stroll 9 75% fine superwash merino wool 25% nylon 231yds/50g scheepjes whirlette yarn 10 60% cottom 40% acrylic 498yds/100g yardage white top with square trim total 1400 1450 1525 1600 1700 1850 2000 2200 2400 yds 7 7 8 8 9 9 10 11 12 skeins accent colors use 1 ball each color for sizes l- 5x 2 balls of most used accent color see notes on modification yardages abbreviations chain - chain blo - back loop only round - round single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch space - space sps - spaces slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 11 gauge 18 sts and 11 row + 4 by 4 - worked in the granny stitch not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 12 sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit chest 32 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 actual measurements 38 39 5 42 46 50 54 56 75 59 5 63 5 this garment has an oversized relaxed fit and is meant to be worn with a 1 5-6 inch ease for a more fitted look go down a size skill level intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 13 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 14 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 15 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 16 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 17 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 18 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2024 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and
